summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the correctness of the training framework's connector components, including accelerator selection, callback management, checkpoint handling, data loading, and signal processing, across various hardware configurations and execution environments.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and robustness of the trainer's integration points so that users can safely run deep‑learning workloads on CPUs, GPUs, TPUs, and multi‑node clusters with proper handling of callbacks, checkpoints, data pipelines, and system signals.
